channel.title: Project wilderness
channel.description: so i dont know if its in right secton put ill move if not so im adding to my sever 3 camps in the wildrness so two of theam are fighting and one is trying to fix it so there gonna be 3 or more npcs at each camps and from a camp 1 of an npc is gonna go to the other camp and fight the others and there is gonna be books at every camp telling the story of what has happend so first of all ill put updates here and could someone think of 3 names to name the camps and if you want a story line im later gonna make into a quest or add it to the achevment diry and some good ideas u may have eney ideas what i should have in camp so far i have tents,camp fire, flags im gonna put smashed tents around the wildy leading to it if you know how to make npc fight each other pm me or comment plz[code]UPDATES : Got the three names for camp thanks to Team_Rocket :] Got the story line [how the wilderness was created] [/code]

item.title: Project wilderness
item.dc:creator: @kill_boy_98 kill boy 98
item.description:
@kill_boy_98 wrote:

ok it will be good coz i i only started coding a bit ago and been following tut so it be my own idea and rs havent got it edit: the story could be about how the wilderness was made im adding smashed tents around the wildy if u know how to make npc fight eachother comment plz

Read full topic

item.title: Project wilderness
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

kill boy 98:

so for firemaking i have firemaking.java so could i do like the same thing but call it camps.java and put it so all my object related from the camps load in that file if not ill do it the normal way from objectmanger.java

Yes, if I’m reading this correctly, then yes, you can absolutely do this and It’s actually encouraged.

Read full topic

kill boy 98:

ive typed it up bad coz on my xbox and ye which one do you u think should be the good camp thanks
